document.full_text: a group of truck drivers who helped stage a three-day strike last week over rising oil prices and high government fees said the city's promise to cut some freight transportation fees was not enough.
document.title: truck drivers in shanghai plan to resume protests
lines_and_colors: a group of truck drivers who helped stage a three-day strike last week over rising oil prices and high government fees said the city's promise to cut some freight transportation fees was not enough.
